author: larryi
msg: Updated build instructions to address new dependencies on other projects.
As a result of these dependencies, the base directory name from expanded
source archives will have to be renamed to match the module's checkout

author: larryi
msg: Update release plan to add Milestone 4 and adjust dates

author: larryi
msg: Port a couple of updates from tomcat_32 branch.
Fixed sign extension problem in doRead().
Fix buffer bounds check. This only fixes the calling of System.out.println().
An exception is still thrown on overflow.  From what I can tell based on
how this routine is called, an overflow should never occur.

author: marcsaeg
msg: Fixed sign extension problem in doRead(), again.
